name: SafebyHUB6
0:
”Alexa, ask hub six to arm away my home”
”Alexa, ask hub six to arm stay my home”
”Alexa, ask hub six to check status for my home”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hub six
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Safe by HUB6 alexa skill allows you to arm your security systems by voice. 

To trigger, you can say:
"Alexa, ask HUB SIX to arm away [home name]"
"Alexa, ask HUB SIX to arm stay [home name]"
"Alexa, ask HUB SIX to check status for [home name]"
"Alexa, ask HUB SIX what's the current status of [home name]"
